Hi Dan,

We have updated the site price increase from 3% to 4% and proposal that has $5000+ initial rental will have +3%.
@joel can you please action this and tell Dan/David once it's done.

Hi Dan, 

Sure, we will do after hours over the weekend and let you know once complete.

Hi Heath

Please make the change and we will have to rebase our pricing for Essentials to work with the new pricing scheme.

Cheers

Dan

Dan Gerber

Managing Director

Advantage Property Styling

Follow us on:



M 0412 955 531 | P 02 9310 1611

Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street, BANKSMEADOW NSW 2019

http://www.advantagestyling.com.au/

Hi Dan,

Yes we received the below and we were exploring the roll out.

Overall increase:
  • Current - the platform is applying a 3% increase to all Premium items.
  • Request - increase this to 4% for all Premium items. 

Orders greater than $4999 (initial rental fee)
  • Current - no increase
  • Request - add an additional 3% to the 4% mentioned above
Exclusion of essentials items 
  • It will not be possible to exclude these, due to the way the system is setup. Please note that no markup is currently applied to Essentials items at the moment. So they will only be increased by an additional 3% if they order value is above $4999.
Please let me know if you would like us to proceed?

Hi Heath/Joel

Can you guys pls confirm receipt of the below request and provide an indicative time for it to be actioned.

Cheers

Dan

Dan Gerber

Managing Director

Advantage Property Styling

Follow us on:



M 0412 955 531 | P 02 9310 1611

Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street, BANKSMEADOW NSW 2019

http://www.advantagestyling.com.au/

Hi Heath and Joel, I've spoken with Dan and we want to proceed with the hidden price rise, but with some adjusted values.

Can we please add 1% hidden premium to all jobs.

Can we also have a trigger for jobs over $4,999, that an additional 3% is added (ie on top of the 1% you're adding above)

Essential quotes will need to be excluded, as well as any pending quotes.

These premiums will be in addition to the hidden 3% that was put on all premium quotes in 2019.

Thank you

Kind Regards,

David McLean

General Manager

Advantage Property Styling

Follow us on:



P 02 9310 1611 | M 0410 567 287

Tenancy 1, Unit 1, 14A Baker Street, BANKSMEADOW NSW 2019

http://www.advantagestyling.com.au/

Hi David, 

Yes, this would be possible. We would ideally add this 1% to the 'Initial Rental' line item and not to the individual inventory prices. This is due the fact that the price increase only applies for total orders which are greater than $6k. 

Hope that makes sense?

action.text: Rica Rosario Valencia assigned to Joel Maligalig

full_threads.body: @joel please let me know what you think?

Hi Heath, We have a hidden 3% price increase that we’ve never removed since 2019. Is it possible to increase that to 4% (ie plus 1%), but also have a trigger that if a quote goes over $6k, that it adds a further 1% increase to the price?
Don’t do anything yet. If it’s possible, I’d like to propose it to Dan and the Sales team next week

Kind Regards,

David McLean
General Manager
Advantage Property Styling
